summary: It Increases your Candlelight with double the original range. Optional you can also increase the time to 5 minutes. Optional you can have another Candlelight Colors!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13550-1-1332551868.jpg[/img]

This is simple, your Candlelight gets double the Range! And if you want to, it stays longer also!

 [b]Optional Candlelight Colors! At the moment Red and Green avilable.. want a red bloodish atmosphere for Your Assasing or Necromancer? You got it! Green for a nature related hunter or Healer? You want another atmospheric Light for screenshots?, try it out![/b]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13550-5-1332551782.jpg[/img]

 [u]Install & Deinstall:[/u]
 Just use NMM or copy the desired files into the data Folder... to deinstall just delete them!
 It very recommended to get this mod to being loaded up after any lighting mod.


If you want another Colors, range or Time.. Just request.. If I feel happy and you asked nicely, I will propably do it ;)

Btw. All Shots has been done, using RCRN Pure.. but you can use this Mod ofcourse with Vanilla Also!!

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13550-3-1332551834.jpg[/img]
[/center]
author: ZoCks

files.name: Zbuffed Candlelight Red - Vanilla Range and Time
